key.name: night-color-temperature
key.summary: The displays color temperature at night

key.name: dusk-dawn-length
key.summary: The length in minute of the dusk and dawn progression.
key.description: The time over which to shift the displays color temperature between the nighttime and daytime color temperatures. This is applied to both the local sunset and sunrise times.

key.name: day-color-temperature
key.summary: The displays color temperature by day
key.description: The displays color temperature by day. The default is 6500 Kelvin which is an identity transformation.

key.name: show-indicator
key.description: Show the indicator on the top panel

key.name: time-source
key.summary: How to calculate the sunrise and sunset times.
key.description: By default this is 'geoclue' to always use the current location. Valid settings are also 'fixed' to use 'sunrise-time' and 'sunset-time' or 'last-known' to use the cached location value instead of having geoclue active at all times.

key.name: night-day
key.description: Whether it is night or day, night being 0.0 and day 1.0, values in between represent dusk/dawn.

key.name: last-location
key.description: Last known location (latitude and longitude in degrees) and accuracy (in meters).

key.name: sunrise-time
key.summary: The time of the simulated sunrise (seconds after midnight)
key.description: The time that the sun rises when in fixed time mode. The setting is given as seconds after midnight.

key.name: sunset-time
key.summary: Fixed time of sunset (seconds after midnight)
key.description: The time of the simulated sunset when in fixed time mode. The setting is given as seconds after midnight.
